content:
During the last day, March 27, Russian troops fired the territory of 119 settlements in ten regions of Ukraine.

About thisinformsMilitary Media Center.

"In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, tanks, artillery, RSSV, SDR, OTRC, UAV and tactical aviation - 119 settlements and 178 infrastructure sites were attacked," the statement reads.

As a result of a hostile attack, they are killed and injured among civilians, the number of victims is clarified.

We will remind, the army of the Russian Federation at nightShe was firedNikopol region with heavy artillery and shock drones: there are wounded.

As reported by the Armyinform, in Zaporozhye as a result of a night attackwoundedtwo women.
title: The enemy attacked 178 infrastructure objects during the day
description: About it reports Military Media Center. “In general, from different types of weapons - mortars, ...
author: Army Inform
